body.raw:
<stb:stb xmlns:stb="http://univ.fr/stb20">
    <stb:title>STB Test</stb:title>
    <stb:version>2.0</stb:version>
    <stb:date>2020-01-23</stb:date>
    <stb:description>Langage web 3</stb:description>
    <stb:client>
        <stb:entity>Université de Rouen</stb:entity>
        <stb:firstname>Rahmani</stb:firstname>
        <stb:lastname>Lounis</stb:lastname>
        <stb:mail>lounis@gmail.com</stb:mail>
        <stb:tel>0123456789</stb:tel>
        <stb:tel>01 23 45 67 89</stb:tel>
        <stb:tel>0 123 456 789</stb:tel>
        <stb:tel>+33 1 23 45 67 89</stb:tel>
    </stb:client>
    <stb:team>
        <stb:person>
            <stb:firstname gender="M." lastname="Ritchie"
				mail="c@bell.lab"> </stb:firstname>
            <stb:function>developpeur</stb:function>
        </stb:person>
        <stb:person>
            <stb:firstname gender="M." lastname="Etable de la Briere"
				mail="calculatrice@halley.com">Lepaute Nicole-Reine</stb:firstname>
            <stb:function>chef projet</stb:function>
        </stb:person>
    </stb:team>
    <stb:detail>
        <stb:feature name="" number="1" section="1">
            <stb:description>Creation projet</stb:description>
            <stb:priority>1</stb:priority>
            <stb:delivery>2020-01-01</stb:delivery>
        </stb:feature>
        <stb:feature name="" number="1" section="2">
            <stb:description>Suppression projet</stb:description>
            <stb:priority>1</stb:priority>
            <stb:delivery>2020-02-05</stb:delivery>
        </stb:feature>
    </stb:detail>
</stb:stb>

request.description: A essayer de renvoyer la même requête pour valider la contrainte  'title et version dupliqués'
